data.message: Thank you so much Facebook, I cannot thank you enough for helping me find old friends and helping me keep up with the news. And also thank you for showing that positivity in the world still exists. I cannot thank you enough for what you do for the facebook community.  You help communicate in a way that i have never seen before. You are involved in the community and i thank you for that, have a nice day and i hope i see more posts from you :) :) <3 <3

replies.message: We appreciate all of your kind words, Eleazar. We're glad you're enjoying your Facebook experience and are happy to have you as part of our community. -Abby
